member.name: M:Workstation.Windows.Controls.Trendline.TryMakePropertyGetFromObjectDelegate``1(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Builds a delegate that casts an object to a target type and then gets the value a property or field.
member.typeparam: The expected return type of the property or field.
member.param: The name of the target property or field.

member.name: T:Workstation.Windows.Data.BooleanToVisibilityCollapsedConverter
member.summary: Returns Visibility.Collapsed if Value equals true

member.name: T:Workstation.Windows.Data.BooleanToVisibilityHiddenConverter
member.summary: Return Visibility.Hidden if Value equals true

member.name: T:Workstation.Windows.Data.BooleanToStringConverter
member.summary: Returns TrueResult if Value equals true, FalseResult if Value equals false

member.name: T:Workstation.Windows.Data.NullToVisibilityHiddenConverter
member.summary: Returns Visibility.Hidden if Value is Null

member.name: T:Workstation.Windows.Data.NullToVisibilityCollapsedConverter
member.summary: Returns Visibility.Collapsed if Value is Null

member.name: T:Workstation.Windows.Data.IsEqualConverter
member.summary: Return true if Value equals Parameter

member.name: T:Workstation.Windows.Data.IsGreaterThanConverter
member.summary: Return true if Value is greater than Parameter

member.name: T:Workstation.Windows.Data.IsLessThanConverter
member.summary: Return true if Value is less than Parameter

member.name: T:Workstation.Windows.Data.IsMatchConverter
member.summary: Return true if Value matches the regular expression (=Parameter) ?

member.name: T:Workstation.Windows.Data.IsNotEqualConverter
member.summary: Return true if Value is not equal Parameter

member.name: T:Workstation.Windows.Data.ScalingConverter
member.summary: Returns a double scaled by two points. Provide string parameter in form of "0.0,0.0 1.0,1.0"

member.name: T:Workstation.Windows.Data.StringSelectionConverter
member.summary: Returns a string selected by index. Provide list of strings in parameter, eg "string0,string1,string2".
